outboundReferences.contextLine: - `placeholder` defines the color for links that don't match any existing note. This is a [[placeholder]] because no file with such name exists (see [[wikilinks]] for more info).

inboundReferences.contextLine: - [ ] to see how your notes are connected, execute the `Foam: Show Graph` command. See [[graph-visualization]].
- the title of a note (e.g. in the [[graph-visualization]]) is given by precedence based on:
- the `type` property can be used to style notes differently in the graph (also see [[graph-visualization]])
